description: When it's seriously cold, little feet need uncompromising insulation. Durable winter boots stand up to frigid walks to school and all-day sledding sessions. A rubber outsole offers extra grip on snow-covered playgrounds, and the pull toggle makes for easy on and off when it's time to come inside.Ripstip nylon and rubber.Comfy sweater knit collar and trim.Lace-up closure with pull toggle is easy to use.Arctic™ rubber outsole is designed for traction in cold weather.Rated to -40°C/-40°F.
name: Baffin Avery Winter Boots - Children to Youths
